document.full_text: "thoroughbred," produced and directed by the academy award winner paul wagner, premieres in the new york area at 10 p.m. wednesday on wnet/thirteen and nationally on pbs on thursday at 9 p.m. eastern.
document.title: the rail: q. and a. with director of 'thoroughbred'
lines_and_colors: "thoroughbred," produced and directed by the academy award winner paul wagner, premieres in the new york area at 10 p.m. wednesday on wnet/thirteen and nationally on pbs on thursday at 9 p.m. eastern.
